reviewText: I love, love, love this movie.  For anyone who is a hardcore beyblade fan who wondered just why Kai acts the way he does wonder no more.  The truth comes out in this volume, yet it's also about how true freindship can truimph over anything.  Young and the young at heart will get a kick out of these diehard beybattles as we continue to watch the bladebreakers face hard lessons and raise above it all to stay together as a true team.
